description: Enjoy this easy-to-make roast lamb with vegetables recipe with family and friends. Paired with a rocket pesto, takes this dish to the next level.
keywords: Roast lamb with vegetables and rocket pesto
name: Roast lamb with vegetables and rocket pesto | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove lemon slices. Carve lamb into slices and serve with roast vegetables and a generous dollop of the pesto.
